title: Proxima Centauri b
summary: Proxima Centauri b (or Proxima b[3]) is an exoplanet orbiting in the habitable zone of the red dwarf star Proxima Centauri, which is the closest star to the Sun and part of a triple star system with Alpha Centauri. It is approximately c. 4.2 ly from Earth in the constellation Centaurus, making it and Proxima c the closest known exoplanets to the Solar System.
